project_descr: The objective of the project is to reduce greenhouse gas emissions in Iraq by demonstrating and catalyzing the application of solar power to meet the energy needs of offices, small businesses, residences and town services

outputs.output_descr: Investment in renewable energy application and policy reform, Capacities of national and sub-national authorities and communities for effective governance, natural and renewable resources management and climate change.
